snippet: Leyla Yunus, a human rights activist and the director of the Institute for Peace and Democracy, had been detained since July 2014.
abstract: Azerbaijan releases human rights activist Leyla Yunus after being detained since July 2014.
lead_paragraph: Leyla Yunus, a human rights activist and the director of the Institute for Peace and Democracy, had been detained since July 2014.

headline.print_headline: Asia; Azerbaijan: Activist Freed From Prison
